UniProt Entry.description: The amino acid sequence of the current peptide coincides with the part of the UniProt entry that represents a peptide precursor.

Literature.Title: Induction of antibacterial proteins and peptides in the coprophilous mushroom Coprinopsis cinerea in response to bacteria.
Literature.Author: Kombrink A, Tayyrov A, Essig A, Stöckli M, Micheller S, Hintze J, van Heuvel Y, Dürig N, Lin CW, Kallio PT, Aebi M, Künzler M

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Bacillus subtilis 168(MIC=4µg/ml),Enterococcus faecalis DSM 20478(MIC=8µg/ml),Enterococcus faecium DSM 13590(MIC=4µg/ml),Staphylococcus carnosus DSM 20501(MIC=8µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus DSM 4910(MIC=>64µg/ml),Escherichia coli DSM 1103(MIC=>64µg/ml),Pseudomonas aeruginosa DSM 1117(MIC=>64µg/ml),Listeria monocytogenes WSLC 1042(MIC=1µg/ml),Corynebacterium diphtheriae DSM 44123(MIC=9µg/ml)
